updatePurchaseListInCart() - Method in class ShoppingCartTest
test the update method:
1. create a new list of grocery
2. set the date of purchase to 01-01-01
3. create a new cart
4. add the list to the cart
5. change the date of the purchase of the list in the cart to 01-02-01
6. verify if the date of our list in the shopping is actually equal to 01-02-01

updateUser() - Method in class UserListTest
verify the update method :
1. create a user
2. add it ot a list
3. retrieve the index of the user in the list
4. modify some parameters in the recently added user
5. get the user by index and compare it with the new updated user, they should be the same
UserList - Class in <Unnamed>
the class UserList is used to make a new list containing all the Accounts
in this class we can manage (delete, add, modify) each Account individually
